DOC.brief_summary: This study compare child 's injury rate ( arm fracture , head injury injury ) play playground equipment granite sand versus wood fibre playing surface . The hypothesis injury rate ( arm fracture , head injury injury ) among school child equal granite sand wood fibre playground surface .
DOC.brief_title: Study Sand Versus Wood Chip Surfaces School Playgrounds Minimize Injury School Children
DOC.criteria: School child Ages 511 Injured fall play equipment supervise school hour Children injure outside supervised school hour
